name: Watizit
description:
Context and presentation :

Watizit is a puzzle game, the goal is to find the name of an animal or an object thanks to its shape. Our game was created with the aim of being simple and quick to take in hand, without requiring too much concentration effort, addressing to any public from 10 years old who wishes to entertain themselves, in public transport for example, on an addictive game where levels follow each other.

Available on Android Jelly Bean (API 16) and more, in English, French and
Spanish.

Inputs :

  • Swipe up or down to find the correct object

Credit :

Developped by Nicolas LAURET and Rooly RANDRIANASOLO

  • Main theme : . https://opengameart.org/content/loop-lonely-witch

Status :

Released
